subject: Soccer
Soccer
lead_paragraph: West Bromwich Albion thrashed fifth-tier Gateshead in the F.A. Cup third round, while seventh-tier Blyth surrendered a two-goal lead to lose 3-2 against second-division Birmingham
snippet: West Bromwich Albion thrashed fifth-tier Gateshead in the F.A. Cup third round, while seventh-tier Blyth surrendered a two-goal lead to lose 3-2 against second-division Birmingham
